# Date.HTTPFormatStyle

**Structure**

Options for generating and parsing string representations of dates following the HTTP date format from [https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc9110.html#http.date].

## Declaration

```swift
struct HTTPFormatStyle
```

## Initializers

- **init()**
